alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sharkey; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 11:30PM CDT until June 12 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murphy, or near Hollandale, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Midnight around 1145 PM CDT. Louise around 1150 PM CDT. Yazoo City around 1210 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
